wordpressWpDailyReads.title: Daily Reads 4/29/2019
wordpressWpDailyReads.content:
Happy Monday, everyone. To start off your week right, check out our choice reads from the news for this Monday.

 

PERSONAL FINANCE

Why Do People Not Think They Are Wealthy When The Data Shows Otherwise

The survey polled 4,400 Americans — 570 of them reported making an income of $100,000 or more. It asked respondents to define their current financial situation by selecting poor, working class, middle class, upper middle class, or affluent (or don’t know).

 

Does money buy happiness

Kahneman and Deaton found that happiness tends to increase along with income up to about $75,000 a year.

 

Even these Wharton business school students lack a basic personal finance education

When it comes to money, most people lack the know-how to make smart moves on their own. Even at Wharton, one of the nation’s top business schools, financial illiteracy is widespread.

 

How to Talk to People About Money

Everyone giving investing advice – or even just sharing investing opinions – should keep top of mind how emotional money is and how different people are.

 

BUSINESS

Avengers: Endgame’ earns an astronomical $350 million at the weekend box office

The Avengers and their battle with Thanos for the Infinity Stones — took in an estimated $350 million over the weekend and a global total of $1.2 billion, making it the biggest opening weekend of all time.
